CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 22, 1955, pg. 12, reads: "New Diamond Market -...The management of the New Diamond Market welcomes you to share in their giant twenty-fifth anniversary celebration beginning Friday, Oct. 21, through Dec. 6 - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Man, and two women, one wearing striped skirt, dark short sleeved sweater, and beaded necklace, holding package and carrying dark handbag, standing at fish counter of New Diamond Market with checkerboard linoleum floor, pendant lighting fixtures, and back wall with neon signs including Fort Pitt brand pure pork sausage
